attributes.action: Defund the BBC let them finance themselves
attributes.additional_details: The general public as a whole CANNOT afford to finance the BBC
attributes.background: Put the BBC on notice they need to go to a subscription service and not rely on the general public

rejection.details:
Unclear in part because the BBC receives funding otherwise than from the licence fee - and there is already a petition on removing the licence fee you which may wish to sign:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
